parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature failure of the 12V battery can cause the vehicle to stall or not start, leading to safety risks, especially if it occurs while driving.
symptoms: the "Check Electrical System" warning light comes on
the 12V battery warning light comes on

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ICCU can cause the 12V battery to drain prematurely, leading to safety risks, especially if it occurs while driving.
symptoms: the "Check Electrical System" warning light comes on
the 12V battery warning light comes on

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The charging issues can cause the vehicle to not charge properly, leading to range anxiety and safety risks.
symptoms: The vehicle stops charging after a short period
or the vehicle cannot charge at all.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The infotainment system issues can cause distractions while driving, leading to safety risks.
symptoms: The Apple CarPlay connectivity drops out
or the USB-A wiring harness repeatedly drops connection.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical system failure can cause the vehicle to stall or not start, leading to safety risks, especially if it occurs while driving.
symptoms: The "Check Electrical System" warning light comes on

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ICCU can cause the vehicle to suddenly lose power, limiting speed and potentially leading to accidents, especially on highways. The failure can also cause the vehicle to become undrivable, leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: inability to move under its own power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the 12V battery can cause the vehicle to suddenly lose power, limiting speed and potentially leading to accidents, especially on highways. The failure can also cause the vehicle to become undrivable, leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: inability to move under its own power

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to suddenly lose power, limiting speed and potentially leading to accidents, especially on highways. The failure can also cause the vehicle to become undrivable, leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: inability to move under its own power

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inconsistent or interrupted charging can cause inconvenience, range anxiety, and potentially leave the driver stranded.
False or misleading advertising can lead to buyer's remorse, dissatisfaction, and potentially affect the vehicle's resale value.
symptoms: battery preconditioning feature not available in US markets.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unreliable collision avoidance warnings can lead to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Randomly triggered collision avoidance warnings while stopped at traffic lights.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the audio system can compromise safety features, such as warning chimes and audible alerts.
symptoms: Failure of the car audio amp
resulting in loss of warning auditable systems and chimes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unreliable transmission and shifting can cause accidents, near-misses, or loss of control.
symptoms: Delayed or failed engagement of Reverse gear
vehicle moving forward instead of reversing.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inconsistent floor mat anchors can cause inconvenience and potentially lead to safety issues.
symptoms: Ring-type anchors instead of Hook-type anchors
